hero.subtitle: Stop the email chaos. Revyze connects homeowners and designers on one intelligent platform where feedback is visual, contextual, and crystal clear.

how_it_works.title: How it Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Whether you're a homeowner or a pro, Revyze simplifies the feedback loop.

client.upload_desc: Take the PDF your architect sent and upload it to your project.
client.comment_desc: Pin comments exactly where you want changes. "Move this wall", "Enlarge this window".
client.share_desc: Invite friends and family to weigh in on your dream home.
client.step1_desc: A home owner wishes to communicate feedback to their pro design and architect team. They take the PDF that their team provided them with and they comment away directly on the plan.
client.step2_desc: Home owners can invite their friends and family to gather their feedback on their project. Get second opinions from the people who matter most.

pro.invite_desc: Upload your project and invite your client to Revyze for a structured feedback session.
pro.collab_desc: Invite your design team, architects, and contractors to align on technical details.
pro.resolve_desc: Turn feedback into tasks and mark them resolved as you update the plans.
pro.step1_desc: A pro wishes to obtain feedback from their client. They upload the PDF about the project and they invite their client to Revyze for feedback. No more confusing email threads.
pro.step2_desc: Pros can invite their peers, designers, and architect teams to gather their feedback on their project. Ensure everyone is building from the same vision.

features.title: Why Revyze?
features.subtitle: We bridge the gap between technical drawings and living spaces.
features.f1_desc: Pin comments directly on the floor plan. No more 'top left corner' confusion.
features.f2_desc: Invite designers, contractors, and family members to review the same version.
features.f3_desc: Keep track of every revision. Never build from an outdated PDF again.
